books.name: the love songs
books.desc: Attitude decides our altitude and when we change your attitude, we change your life. Attitude is Everything: Change Your Attitude...Change Your Life is a success manual that gives plans for us to take control of our lives and unleash the untapped potential. This book consists of 12 Lessons that cover a wide range of topics like paving one’s path, making commitments to oneself, confronting fears, etc.
books.author: Murphy Joseph
